physical_appearance: This is a pair of silver engraved bowls. Each bowl is engraved with a foliage and petal border, with a decorative edging down the body. The inner edge of the bowl are also decorated with engravings of foliage and petal scrolls. There are no scratches seen on the bowls.
title_text: Pair of Chased & Gadrooned Silver Bowls (Batil) Chased & Gadrooned Silver Bowls (Batil)
